Definition: Given a prompt and two completions, select the completion that has the most similar style to the prompt. Style includes the tone, word choice, grammar, and sentence structure throughout the prompt-completion pair. If a prompt is colloquial, the completion should also be colloquial, rather than a completion that is encyclopedic or overly formal. Generate either Completion A or Completion B.
